title: In the Age of Generative AI, How Will Media Ensure Election Reporting Accuracy?
description: In a year marked by pivotal elections and the omnipresent influence of disruptive technologies, the convergence of politics and AI poses a dual challenge for news outlets worldwide. Generative AI, with its capacity to create compelling yet deceptive content, casts a shadow over the integrity of information dissemination in the midst of critical electoral processes.  […]
